resources.string: Please contact your kernel dev and ask them to add Spectrum support
Root access was not found or denied. Spectrum needs root to set profiles.
Storage permission denied, Couldn\'t look for custom descriptions
The default profile switch between different modes to provide Over-all Best Experience .
This profile is known for its smooth performance in basic tasks while maintaining fantastic battery .
Ultra-conservative profile that lets performance take a hit in order to achieve long-lasting battery life.
Need that extra 10 FPS? I gotchu. Identical to performance in most areas other than the unlocked Graphics performance
Join our Support Group for Support and Update

Looks like you\'ve found the hidden EXKM Profile loader! While profile loading was originally planned to be a premium feature, I\'ve decided to include it as an easter egg. Others may be hidden in Spectrum, so happy hunting!
Are you sure you want to load this file?
